### Line Chart
```{r draw line chart ,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

  geom_line()
```

### Step line  Chart
```{r draw step line chart ,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

  geom_step()
```
